description: Work Permit Risk Badge Framework - ALL severity levels MUST be determined by Detective agent via MCP caselaw search at runtime

_critical_rules.rule_1: ALL severity assessments MUST come from Detective agent caselaw analysis
_critical_rules.rule_2: DO NOT use LLM training knowledge to determine risk severity
_critical_rules.rule_3: Scores are DYNAMIC - populated at runtime based on case law findings
_critical_rules.rule_4: If no case law available, mark severity as 'UNASSESSED' - do not guess
_critical_rules.rule_5: Category-specific badges apply ONLY to their respective work permit types

severity_score_framework._note: Score values are framework only - actual severity determined by Detective agent based on case law

FATAL.meaning: Hard eligibility failure - application cannot proceed
FATAL.determination: REQUIRES Detective agent to confirm via case law that this issue results in automatic refusal

CRITICAL.determination: REQUIRES Detective agent to confirm via case law

HIGH.determination: REQUIRES Detective agent to assess based on refusal rate in similar cases

MEDIUM.determination: REQUIRES Detective agent to assess based on case outcomes

LOW.determination: REQUIRES Detective agent to confirm minimal impact via case law

UNASSESSED.meaning: Severity not yet determined - awaiting Detective agent analysis
UNASSESSED.determination: Detective agent must search case law before assigning severity

threshold_triggers._note: Thresholds are provisional - may be adjusted based on Detective agent case law analysis

_runtime_instructions.step_1: Intake agent identifies work permit category and extracts case facts
_runtime_instructions.step_2: Intake agent identifies potential risk badges from case facts based on category
_runtime_instructions.step_3: Detective agent executes _detective_query for each triggered badge
_runtime_instructions.step_4: Detective agent analyzes case law outcomes to determine severity
_runtime_instructions.step_5: Detective MUST cite specific cases for each severity determination
_runtime_instructions.step_6: Strategist agent receives severity assessments WITH case law citations
_runtime_instructions.step_7: Scores are calculated only after Detective provides case-law-based severity
_runtime_instructions.step_8: If Detective finds no relevant case law, severity remains 'UNASSESSED'
_runtime_instructions.step_9: Gatekeeper validates that all severity assessments have case law support

_audit_guidance.scoring_system: Severity levels MUST be determined by Detective agent case law analysis - not by LLM training knowledge
_audit_guidance.forbidden: DO NOT assign severity based on assumptions or training data
_audit_guidance.validation_source: All severity assessments require MCP caselaw citation
_audit_guidance.update_frequency: Severity cache may be updated based on new case law findings
_audit_guidance.category_routing: Use applies_to field to determine which badges apply to each work permit category
